verses.roman:
śuna, bhāi, ei saba caitanya-mahimā
ei śloke kahe tāṅra mahimāra sīmā

synonyms: śuna—please hear; bhāi—O brothers; ei—this; saba—all; caitanya—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahimā—the glories; ei—this; śloke—verse; kahe—says; tāṅra—of Him; mahimāra—of the glories; sīmā—the limit.
translation: My dear brothers, please hear all these glories of Lord Caitanya. This verse clearly summarizes His activities and characteristics.
